verses.verse: Then<WG5119> Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> took<WG2983> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> scourged<WG3146> him.

And<WG2532> the soldiers<WG4757> platted<WG4120> a crown<WG4735> of<WG1537> thorns<WG173>, and put it on<WG2007> his<WG846> head<WG2776>, and<WG2532> they put on<WG4016> him<WG846> a purple<WG4210> robe<WG2440>,
And<WG2532> said<WG3004>, Hail<WG5463>, King<WG935> of the Jews<WG2453>! and<WG2532> they smote<WG1325> him<WG846> with their hands<WG4475>.

Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> went<WG1831> forth<WG1854> again<WG3825>, and<WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Behold<WG2396>, I bring<WG71> him<WG846> forth<WG1854> to you<WG5213>, that<WG2443> ye may know<WG1097> that<WG3754> I find<WG2147> no<WG3762> fault<WG156> in<WG1722> him<WG846>.

Then<WG3767> came<WG1831> Jesus<WG2424> forth<WG1854>, wearing<WG5409> the crown<WG4735> of thorns<WG174>, and<WG2532> the purple<WG4210> robe<WG2440>. And<WG2532> Pilate saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Behold<WG2396> the man<WG444>!

When<WG3753> the chief priests<WG749> therefore<WG3767> and<WG2532> officers<WG5257> saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, they cried out<WG2905>, saying<WG3004>, Crucify<WG4717> him, crucify<WG4717> him. Pilate<WG4091> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Take<WG2983> ye<WG5210> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> crucify<WG4717> him: for<WG1063> I<WG1473> find<WG2147> no<WG3756> fault<WG156> in<WG1722> him<WG846>.

The Jews<WG2453> answered<WG611> him<WG846>, We<WG2249> have<WG2192> a law<WG3551>, and<WG2532> by<WG2596> our<WG2257> law<WG3551> he ought<WG3784> to die<WG599>, because<WG3754> he made<WG4160> himself<WG1438> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>.
When<WG3753> Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> heard<WG191> that<WG5126> saying<WG3056>, he was<WG5399> the more<WG3123> afraid<WG5399>;

And<WG2532> went<WG1525> again<WG3825> into<WG1519> the judgment hall<WG4232>, and<WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto Jesus<WG2424>, Whence<WG4159> art<WG1488> thou<WG4771>? But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> gave<WG1325> him<WG846> no<WG3756> answer<WG612>.

Then<WG3767> saith<WG3004> Pilate<WG4091> unto him<WG846>, Speakest thou<WG2980> not<WG3756> unto me<WG1698>? knowest thou<WG1492> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> I have<WG2192> power<WG1849> to crucify<WG4717> thee<WG4571>, and<WG2532> have<WG2192> power<WG1849> to release<WG630> thee<WG4571>?

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611>, Thou couldest have<WG2192> no<WG3756> power<WG1849> at all against<WG3762> <WG2596> me<WG1700>, except<WG1508> it were<WG2258> given<WG1325> thee<WG4671> from above<WG509>: therefore<WG5124> <WG1223> he that delivered<WG3860> me<WG3165> unto thee<WG4671> hath<WG2192> the greater<WG3187> sin<WG266>.

And from<WG1537> thenceforth<WG5127> Pilate<WG4091> sought<WG2212> to release<WG630> him<WG846>: but<WG1161> the Jews<WG2453> cried out<WG2896>, saying<WG3004>, If<WG1437> thou let<WG630> this man<WG5126> go<WG630>, thou art<WG1488> not<WG3756> Caesar's<WG2541> friend<WG5384>: whosoever<WG3956> maketh<WG4160> himself<WG846> a king<WG935> speaketh against<WG483> Caesar<WG2541>.

When Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> heard<WG191> that<WG5126> saying<WG3056>, he brought<WG71> Jesus<WG2424> forth<WG1854>, and<WG2532> sat down<WG2523> in<WG1909> the judgment seat<WG968> in<WG1519> a place<WG5117> that is called<WG3004> the Pavement<WG3038>, but<WG1161> in the Hebrew<WG1447>, Gabbatha<WG1042>.

And<WG1161> it was<WG2258> the preparation<WG3904> of the passover<WG3957>, and<WG1161> about<WG5616> the sixth<WG1623> hour<WG5610>: and<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto the Jews<WG2453>, Behold<WG2396> your<WG5216> King<WG935>!

But<WG1161> they cried out<WG2905>, Away with<WG142> him, away with<WG142> him, crucify<WG4717> him<WG846>. Pilate<WG4091> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Shall I crucify<WG4717> your<WG5216> King<WG935>? The chief priests<WG749> answered<WG611>, We have<WG2192> no<WG3756> king<WG935> but<WG1508> Caesar<WG2541>.
Then<WG5119> delivered he<WG3860> him<WG846> therefore<WG3767> unto them<WG846> to<WG2443> be crucified<WG4717>. And<WG1161> they took<WG3880> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> led him away<WG520>.

And<WG2532> he bearing<WG941> his<WG846> cross<WG4716> went forth<WG1831> into<WG1519> a place<WG5117> called<WG3004> the place of a skull<WG2898>, which<WG3739> is called<WG3004> in the Hebrew<WG1447> Golgotha<WG1115>:

Where<WG3699> they crucified<WG4717> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> two<WG1417> other<WG243> with<WG3326> him<WG846>, on either side one<WG2532> <WG1782> <WG1782>, and<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> in the midst<WG3319>.

And<WG1161> <WG2532> Pilate<WG4091> wrote<WG1125> a title<WG5102>, and<WG2532> put<WG5087> it on<WG1909> the cross<WG4716>. And<WG1161> the writing<WG1125> was<WG2258>, JESUS<WG2424> OF NAZARETH<WG3480> THE KING<WG935> OF THE JEWS<WG2453>.

This<WG5126> title<WG5102> then<WG3767> read<WG314> many<WG4183> of the Jews<WG2453>: for<WG3754> the place<WG5117> where<WG3699> Jesus<WG2424> was crucified<WG4717> was<WG2258> nigh<WG1451> to the city<WG4172>: and<WG2532> it was<WG2258> written<WG1125> in Hebrew<WG1447>, and Greek<WG1676>, and Latin<WG4515>.

Then<WG3767> said<WG3004> the chief priests<WG749> of the Jews<WG2453> to Pilate<WG4091>, Write<WG1125> not<WG3361>, The King<WG935> of the Jews<WG2453>; but<WG235> that<WG3754> he<WG1565> said<WG2036>, I am<WG1510> King<WG935> of the Jews<WG2453>.
Pilate<WG4091> answered<WG611>, What<WG3739> I have written<WG1125> I have written<WG1125>.

Then<WG3767> the soldiers<WG4757>, when<WG3753> they had crucified<WG4717> Jesus<WG2424>, took<WG2983> his<WG846> garments<WG2440>, and<WG2532> made<WG4160> four<WG5064> parts<WG3313>, to every<WG1538> soldier<WG4757> a part<WG3313>; and also<WG2532> his coat<WG5509>: now<WG1161> the coat<WG5509> was<WG2258> without seam<WG729>, woven<WG5307> from<WG1537> the top<WG509> throughout<WG1223> <WG3650>. woven: or, wrought

They said<WG2036> therefore<WG3767> among<WG4314> themselves<WG240>, Let us<WG4977> not<WG3361> rend<WG4977> it<WG846>, but<WG235> cast lots<WG2975> for<WG4012> it<WG846>, whose<WG5101> it shall be<WG2071>: that<WG2443> the scripture<WG1124> might be fulfilled<WG4137>, which<WG3588> saith<WG3004>, They parted<WG1266> my<WG3450> raiment<WG2440> among them<WG1438>, and<WG2532> for<WG1909> my<WG3450> vesture<WG2441> they did cast<WG906> lots<WG2819>. These things<WG5023> <WG3303> therefore<WG3767> the soldiers<WG4757> did<WG4160>.

Now<WG1161> there stood<WG2476> by<WG3844> the cross<WG4716> of Jesus<WG2424> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother's<WG3384> sister<WG79>, Mary<WG3137> the wife <WG3588> of Cleophas<WG2832>, and<WG2532> Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094>. Cleophas: or, Clopas

When Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> saw<WG1492> his mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> the disciple<WG3101> standing by<WG3936>, whom<WG3739> he loved<WG25>, he saith<WG3004> unto his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, Woman<WG1135>, behold<WG2400> thy<WG4675> son<WG5207>!

Then<WG1534> saith he<WG3004> to the disciple<WG3101>, Behold<WG2400> thy<WG4675> mother<WG3384>! And<WG2532> from<WG575> that<WG1565> hour<WG5610> that disciple<WG3101> took<WG2983> her<WG846> unto<WG1519> his own<WG2398> home.

After<WG3326> this<WG5124>, Jesus<WG2424> knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> all things<WG3956> were<WG5055> now<WG2235> accomplished<WG5055>, that<WG2443> the scripture<WG1124> might be fulfilled<WG5048>, saith<WG3004>, I thirst<WG1372>.

Now<WG3767> there was set<WG2749> a vessel<WG4632> full<WG3324> of vinegar<WG3690>: and<WG1161> they filled<WG4130> a spunge<WG4699> with vinegar<WG3690>, and<WG2532> put it upon<WG4060> hyssop<WG5301>, and put<WG4374> it to his<WG846> mouth<WG4750>.

When<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> had received<WG2983> the vinegar<WG3690>, he said<WG2036>, It is finished<WG5055>: and<WG2532> he bowed<WG2827> his head<WG2776>, and gave up<WG3860> the ghost<WG4151>.

The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767>, because<WG1893> it was<WG2258> <WG2258> the preparation<WG3904>, that<WG3363> the bodies<WG4983> should<WG3306> not<WG3363> remain<WG3306> upon<WG1909> the cross<WG4716> on<WG1722> the sabbath day<WG4521>, (for<WG1063> that<WG1565> sabbath day<WG4521> was<WG2258> an high<WG3173> day<WG2250>,) besought<WG2065> Pilate<WG4091> that<WG2443> their<WG846> legs<WG4628> might be broken<WG2608>, and<WG2532> that they might be taken away<WG142>.

Then<WG3767> came<WG2064> the soldiers<WG4757>, and<WG2532> brake<WG2608> the legs<WG4628> of the<WG3303> first<WG4413>, and<WG2532> of the other<WG243> which<WG3588> was crucified with<WG4957> him<WG846>.
But<WG1161> when<WG5613> they came<WG2064> to<WG1909> Jesus<WG2424>, and saw<WG1492> that he<WG846> was dead<WG2348> already<WG2235>, they brake<WG2608> not<WG3756> his<WG846> legs<WG4628>:

But<WG235> one<WG1520> of the soldiers<WG4757> with a spear<WG3057> pierced<WG3572> his<WG846> side<WG4125>, and<WG2532> forthwith<WG2117> came there out<WG1831> blood<WG129> and<WG2532> water<WG5204>.

And<WG2532> he that saw<WG3708> it bare record<WG3140>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> record<WG3141> is<WG2076> true<WG228>: and he<WG2548> knoweth<WG1492> that<WG3754> he saith<WG3004> true<WG227>, that<WG2443> ye<WG5210> might believe<WG4100>.
For<WG1063> these things<WG5023> were done<WG1096>, that<WG2443> the scripture<WG1124> should be fulfilled<WG4137>, A bone<WG3747> of him<WG846> shall<WG4937> not<WG3756> be broken<WG4937>.
And<WG2532> again<WG3825> another<WG2087> scripture<WG1124> saith<WG3004>, They shall look<WG3700> on<WG1519> him whom<WG3739> they pierced<WG1574>.

And<WG1161> after<WG3326> this<WG5023> Joseph<WG2501> of<WG575> Arimathaea<WG707>, being<WG5607> a disciple<WG3101> of Jesus<WG2424>, but<WG1161> secretly<WG2928> for<WG1223> fear<WG5401> of the Jews<WG2453>, besought<WG2065> Pilate<WG4091> that<WG2443> he might take away<WG142> the body<WG4983> of Jesus<WG2424>: and<WG2532> Pilate<WG4091> gave him leave<WG2010>. He came<WG2064> therefore<WG3767>, and<WG2532> took<WG142> the body<WG4983> of Jesus<WG2424>.

And<WG1161> there came<WG2064> also<WG2532> Nicodemus<WG3530>, which<WG3588> at the first<WG4412> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> Jesus<WG2424> by night<WG3571>, and brought<WG5342> a mixture<WG3395> of myrrh<WG4666> and<WG2532> aloes<WG250>, about<WG5616> an hundred<WG1540> pound<WG3046> weight.

Then<WG3767> took they<WG2983> the body<WG4983> of Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> wound<WG1210> it<WG846> in linen clothes<WG3608> with<WG3326> the spices<WG759>, as<WG2531> the manner<WG1485> of the Jews<WG2453> is<WG2076> to bury<WG1779>.

Now<WG1161> in<WG1722> the place<WG5117> where<WG3699> he was crucified<WG4717> there was<WG2258> a garden<WG2779>; and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the garden<WG2779> a new<WG2537> sepulchre<WG3419>, wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> was<WG5087> never<WG3764> man<WG3762> yet<WG3764> laid<WG5087>.
There<WG1563> laid they<WG5087> Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> because<WG1223> of the Jews'<WG2453> preparation<WG3904> day; for<WG3754> the sepulchre<WG3419> was<WG2258> nigh at hand<WG1451>.
